member.name: IPipeDouble.Pull
member.summary: Retrieves data of the double integer type from the pipe source.
member.param: A pointer to the memory buffer that receives the data. The buffer must be able to hold at least the number of double integers specified in cRequest.
The number of double integers requested.
The actual number of double integers returned.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK to indicate that the data was retrieved successfully.

member.name: IPipeDouble.Push
member.summary: Sends data of the double integer type to the pipe source.
member.param: A pointer to the memory buffer that holds the data to be sent.
The number of double integers in the buffer.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK to indicate that the data was sent successfully.

member.name: IPipeDouble
member.summary: Transfers data of the double type (which is 64 bits wide).
